sys_hub_flow.description: First attempt to notify 8570 compliant users that their certification is about to expire
sys_hub_flow.name: 8570 - 30 day Certification expiration

sys_variable_value.value: Your 8570 Compliance will expire within 30 days

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Candidate➛First name,

Our records indicate that either your

Baseline 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛Baseline Certification➛Name Certification or your

Computer Environment 2➛8570 Candidate Record➛CE Certification➛Name Certification will expire within 30 days. Please coordinate a time to re-certify for the certification that will elapse within 30 days.

Thank you,

IA Management
